subject: feat(init): scaffold Expo project with Supabase schema and geospatial queries
body:
Project initialization for the fuel station finder app:
- Expo SDK 54 with TypeScript, file-based routing (expo-router), tabs template
- Supabase schema: fuel_types, stations (PostGIS), fuel_prices, price_history
- Materialized view (current_prices) with auto-refresh trigger
- RLS policies: public read for active data, admin full access via JWT role
- find_stations_in_radius() PostgreSQL function for geospatial radius search
- Seed data: 6 SA fuel types, 12 Gauteng stations with sample prices
- Supabase client (src/lib/supabase.ts) and app-level TypeScript types
- Route stubs for station detail and admin views
- .env.example with required env var names

Docker daemon unavailable in this environment so migrations are untested
against a live database â€” SQL follows the spec exactly and is ready to run
via `supabase start` or against a remote Supabase project.

Tags: expo, supabase, postgis, schema, init
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: fuel-station-finder
Semver: minor
